items.title: French MPs vote to scrap low-emission zones
items.description: Critics said the zones hit those who cannot afford less-polluting vehicles the hardest.

items.title: Israel announces major expansion of settlements in occupied West Bank
items.description: The biggest such move in years is condemned by the Palestinian presidency as a "dangerous escalation".

items.title: What happens now after Trump suffers major blow to economic policy?
items.description: The Trump administration said it would appeal against the ruling shortly after it was announced.

items.title: Paedophile surgeon's sentence leaves victims appalled
items.description: Prolific abuser Joel Le Scouarnec's 20-year sentence raises questions about whether French law is too lenient.

items.title: Turkey to fine airline passengers who stand up before plane stops
items.description: Those who unbuckle before the "fasten seatbelt" sign is turned off face a fine, aviation authority says.
